title: Project-Based Data Warehousing Practical Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic database concepts and SQL application skills
context.additional_context: An offline, practice-oriented training program for employees aimed at strengthening data analysis capabilities within organizations. A collaborative learning environment is structured using personal devices (BYOD).

learning_goals: Learners can explain the design and implementation process of a data warehouse reflecting real-world corporate scenarios.
A data integration system can be built by applying the ETL (Extract-Transform-Load) process.
A decision support system can be implemented and visualized reports generated using OLAP technology.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
